description: Discover diverse wildlife in the park.
Take boat rides on Lake Chebera.
Visit the park during the dry season for best viewing.
Enjoy picnic spots with beautiful views.
Take part in community-based tourism initiatives.
Learn about the local flora and fauna.
Explore the park's rivers and wetlands.
Engage in trekking and hiking activities.
Take guided tours to learn about the park's history.
Visit local villages and experience their culture.
Learn about the medicinal plants used by locals.
Experience seasonal festivals and cultural events.
Take part in bird migration studies.
Enjoy the fresh air and natural beauty.
